title: Start Here
description: Get familiar with EV3 in three fun activities!

cards.title: Unit Plans
cards.description: All of the EV3 Classroom lessons are grouped into themed units to actively engage middle school students in STEM learning.

cards.title: Core Set Models
cards.description: These models will inspire you and challenge your robotics skills. Take LEGO<sup>®</sup> MINDSTORMS<sup>®</sup> Education EV3 to the next level!
